sentences.english: Compared with utterance understanding, pragmatic presupposition has the basic features of appropriateness and common acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 相對於話語理解，語用預設具備合適性和共知性。

sentences.english: It is the spirit in which they are said which is all-important .
sentences.chinese: 這些話語所出自的靈纔是最重要的。

sentences.english: Some mourners wrote inscriptions on the wooden barriers of the pools.
sentences.chinese: 有些悼念者還在水池旁的木框上寫下話語。

sentences.english: There are no interjections when he speaks.
sentences.chinese: 他的話語中從來沒有感嘆詞。

sentences.english: There's a third way in which language impedes speech.
sentences.chinese: 語言對話語的影響還體現在第三個方面。

sentences.english: Over the last several chapters of John we've seen many examples of Jesus being rejected by the Jews.
sentences.chinese: 上幾章中頻繁出現猶太人拒絕耶穌的話語。

sentences.english: After inspecting the school he showed his satisfaction with warm words.
sentences.chinese: 視察完後，他用熱情的話語表達了墅對學校的滿意。

sentences.english: The degree of hybridity is conditioned by the power of discourse and the effects of cross-cultural communication.
sentences.chinese: 譯文雜合程度受權力話語和跨丈化交際效果的制約。
或者隨便說些起作用的話語。

sentences.english: The studies of Foucault and New Historicism have aroused people's awareness of the discourse of power.
sentences.chinese: 福柯和新歷史主義批評喚起了人們對權力話語的覺醒。

sentences.english: His comforting words almost reduced his wife to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他安慰的話語讓他的妻子幾乎掉下了眼淚。

sentences.english: Listenned to rich brocade words in strong of self-confidence, the vegetable autumn wallet one's lip smiled.
sentences.chinese: 聽出了錦繡話語中強大的自信，素秋抿嘴笑了。

sentences.english: The most awkward utterance in the 20th century China was the wholesale anti-tradition.
sentences.chinese: 全盤性反傳統就是20世紀中國最尷尬的話語表達。
他用極爲精確的話語發言。

sentences.english: These words allude to the primal memories of Egypt and the Exodus.
sentences.chinese: 這些話語間接地回憶古遠的埃及和出埃及的事件。

sentences.english: Decorate it with your favorite pictures and inspirational quotes.
sentences.chinese: 用你最喜歡的圖片和鼓舞人心的話語裝飾。
